title: The default value set in list box of report parameter is lost after modifying the default value
description:
Description: When modifying the default value of a list box in a report parameter, the default value is lost.
Steps to reproduce: 1. Open the report parameter settings. 2. Select the list box type. 3. Set the default value to 'aaa'. 4. Modify the default value. 5. Click OK.
OB: The default value is not preserved after modifying it in the report parameter list box.
EB: The default value 'aaa' should be maintained after modifying it in the report parameter list box.
SR:
1. Open the report parameter settings.
2. Select the list box type.
3. Set the default value to 'aaa'.
4. Modify the default value.
5. Click OK and verify that the default value 'aaa' is still preserved in the report parameter list box.
